tasks.label: Deploy to Codeberg Pages
tasks.command: cd _site && git add --all && git commit -m 'Deploy' && git push origin pages && cd ..

tasks.label: Deploy with History Squash
tasks.command: cd _site && git add --all && git commit -m 'Deploy' && git checkout --orphan temp && git add -A && git commit -m 'Fresh start' && git branch -D pages && git branch -m pages && git push origin pages --force && cd ..
